A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Expectations were too high for this episode. It is too long\, lack character development\, some of the plot lines are laughable and several scenes could have been omitted due to lack of contribution to the main story. Disappointing for a fan of the originals and someone that enjoyed the set up and nostalgic start from The Force Awakens\, even though it slightly lack originality. It had the urge to see that more than once\, not with Last Jedi sadly. I wanted to love it but did not..
